alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 3:09PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gadsden and Leon Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 309 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Midway, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midway, Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida State University, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Gaither Community Center, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Eight Mile Pond, Tallahassee Mall, Tallahassee Regional A/P, Governors Square Mall, Natural Bridge, Belair, Levy Park, Indian Head Acres, Andrew and Chaires Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
